d:
In most of the Fire Emblem games since Fire Emblem 6 (2001, GBA), the "Support System" is available as a way to explore more the depth of each playable character through the interaction between other few, selected characters.

This gallery is going to offer Illustrated Interpretations of every support between the characters from Fire Emblem: 6 The Binding Blade (2001).

the following FE entries (only 1 between the C,B,A support levels) will be also featured in future correspective gallery each.

FE7 (2003)
FE8 (2004)
FE9 (2005)
FE12 (2011)
FE15 (2017)

The support system exists in latter games as well, but the writing in most of them is subpar compared to the aforementioned entries (too bad, because some of the characters are very interesting by themselves).

Supports will be in order of characters and entry.

The girls and women will also have a bonus Pin Up image each.
n: [Misc] Fire Emblem 6 - Illustrated Support Convos [AI GENERATED]
